Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Hi Dimitar,  Thanks for reaching out to us!  I'll answer your questions honestly and to the best of my ability.  1.  Company was established formally I believe May of this year.  The project as a concept has been in the making for well over a year, in the 15 to 18 month range.  2.  Goal of the pre-sale is to raise awareness and give away tokens.  The sooner people buy the less we'll raise.  For example, if people max out the bonus tokens on day one then we will have raised $5,000,000 in USD equivalent tokens.  If nobody buys until day 10 then and then all of the sudden the bonus tokens are exhausted we will have raised $7,500,000 in USD equivalent tokens during the Pre-ICO.  The overall goal of the project is to raise $25,000,000 tokens while giving away 1,000,000 tokens in the Pre-ICO bonus and bounty campaign combined, and hopefully, that's what we'll do.  3.  Tim is a senior software architect for a Fortune 500 company.  He's also the technology parter of the MonsterByte project, a recently completed casino ICO.  He's helped us out with our technology regarding escrow of tokens and creating a payment gateway that's acceptable to our legal team from a fiduciary perspective.  He has no day to day influence in our operations but I'm sure we'll see each other from time to time after our offering is over.  Maybe we'll pull him from his Fortune 500 gig one day!  4.  Slack channel / Telegram.  We've thought about it.  Since we're more of a dividend token play I'm not sure what meaningful part a slack channel or Telegram account would play.    5.  Price of the Pre-ICO involves bonus tokens in addition to your purchase, not discounted token prices.  On day 1 of the Pre-ICO, a person purchasing $100 USD-equivalent of PEX-Tokens will receive 115 PEX-Tokens due to the 15% bonus.  Day 10 purchasers would receive 110 PEX-Tokens with their 10% bonus.  6.  None of us are big fans of LinkedIn.  I'm sure if you check there may be some data gathered up from around the internet, but I don't think I have a formal LinkedIn account.  Theresa might because she's younger.  The only conversation that we've had about LinkedIn is that ICO listings kept asking for a LinkedIn thread so I directed our tech team to make the company a LinkedIn profile.  We've been business executives and entrepreneurs, and nobody's going to do business with us based on our good looks, well except Theresa.    7.  The purchased tokens will be released to people's individual WAVES wallets sometime in November, after the ICO during our Post-ICO process.  Any unsold tokens may be sold on open exchanges in the future at some unspecified time, but there will be no more PEX-Tokens ever in existence beyond the 30,000,000 fixed supply.  As a WAVES-platform token, the PEX-Token will trade freely on the DEX Exchange.  We would love to have our token trading freely Post-ICO on platforms such as Poloniex and Bittrex.  We've emailed them with no response, probably because we're still early in the process, but as we move forward we'll make decisions such as this to the benefit of our Token Holders.  We're Token Holders too after all.  Hope that helps!

Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Sorry for the delay.  These time limits on newbie accounts here are miserable.  It takes so long that you end up getting other work done and you have to come back as best that you can.  Answer:  Your main WAVES wallet is the one you need since the PEX-Token is a WAVES token.  If you were depositing Bitcoin or Ethereum into the WAVES wallet you would need their specific deposit addresses, but it's different with us since we're WAVES.  We'll be depositing your PEX-Tokens to your main WAVES wallet address.  The main WAVES address on your Android device is fine.

Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Prime-Ex Perpetual is in the business of selling, not leasing.  Here's where leasing can play a factor, however:  we're building in areas that expats routinely favor.  That means that we're building in places that expats routinely fly down to check out.  These areas are tourist areas, with many people coming down every year as tourists checking out the highlands and the beaches.  If our homeowners want to take advantage of this and lease their property out as vacation rentals or even long term rentals that's there business.  There are vacation homes in the beach communities that routinely rent for over a thousand dollars a week.  Our homeowners could choose to earn some money when they're away and they would not be breaking any agreements with us.  The home is theirs, and they can do with it as they wish.

Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: This is a concept that banks employ all the time.  Banks want their customers to sign up to autodraft their mortgage payments so that delinquency percentages go down.  To affect their customer behavior they incentivize their customers by giving an interest rate discount if they will do autodraft, which lowers the customer's monthly payment.  We're doing the same thing by giving our customers an incentive to pay their mortgage payment using our PEX-Token, which positively affects demand for our token in the open exchanges.

If you check some of the initial approvals and rejections, it's meaningful data for our crypto warriors so that they can see that they're either doing it correctly or incorrectly in more of a real-time way, so that their submissions aren't disallowed two weeks after the fact and they've wasted a lot of time.  We're trying to be responsive and offer our bounty claims on submissions that are truly helpful to our overall mission.  It also allows you to see how your percentage of bounty shares are stacking up against the other users overall, which we think is great!

Author: Tactical Genius
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: There we go again another real estate project.I like the coin supply with such a low supply alot could be pulled off from this project.What happens to unsold tokens? Will they be burnt? Is there a guarantee that no more tokens will be created? Because real estate projects are by far very lucrative and if a project performs well there maybe a temptation to create more tokens.

Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Hi There Tactical,  Yes, were a real estate project.  Our offering should prove to be quite interesting to you if you take the time to read through what we're doing.   Unsold tokens:  We are offering 25,000,000 for sale.  Any unsold tokens will remain the property of Prime-Ex S.A. and will be offered for sale at some later date in the future.  They will not be burnt.  Is there a guarantee that no more tokens will be created?  Yes.  In fact, the tokens have already been issued and they're not reissuable.  They are already in escrow with our attorneys and we can't touch them.  It's better than a guarantee.  It's impossible for us to issue more.  Thanks for your interest in the project.  We're excited about our upcoming bounty program, and the Pre-ICO is now just 10 or so days away.  If you have any further questions I'll be happy to do my best to answer them.

Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Our project hit an amazing milestone today in a very short amount of time.  Thanks to all of those who've offered support to our project so far.  Much appreciated!  --- --- ---  http://nasdaq.einnews.com/pr_news/402394117/the-prime-ex-perpetual-project-pre-ico-ramp-up-surpasses-10-000-facebook-followers-in-first-18-hours  The Prime-Ex Perpetual Project Pre-ICO Ramp Up Surpasses 10,000 Facebook Followers in First 18 Hours Blockchain-Based Real Estate Start-up Pays 80% Profits to PEX-Token Holders  PANAMA CITY, Panama, September 6, 2017 — /EINPresswire/ The Prime-Ex Perpetual project has announced it surpassed more than 10,000 Facebook followers on its official page in just 18 hours.  The Prime-Ex Perpetual project will disrupt the real estate industry by re-thinking the way homebuilding, home selling, and home financing are approached. Prime-Ex Perpetual realizes synergistic system and bulk purchase efficiencies that are passed along via dividend distributions to PEX-Token holders.  “We’re both humbled and inspired by the attention given our project in such a small amount of time,” remarked John Gilbert, CEO and Co-Founder of the project. “This was certainly more initial support than we anticipated. We realize this is a huge vote of confidence, and we continue to push on toward our official Pre-ICO launch on September 18th with a new sense of pride thanks to the amazing support shown to us by the cryptotoken community.”  About Prime-Ex Perpetual  The Prime-Ex Perpetual proof of concept occurs in the cool highlands and the warm beaches of the Republic of Panama, a top expat destination where financing homes is very difficult. Prime-Ex Perpetual delivers 80% of profits back to the token holders. Once the concept is proven, Prime-Ex Perpetual will expand into other geographic locations worldwide.  About Pre-ICO  PEX-Tokens will be offered beginning September 18th pegged at 1:$1.00 USD-equivalent values of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and WAVES tokens. Early-bird purchasers will receive as much as 15% in incentive PEX-Tokens for participating early in the campaign limited to a combined total of 750,000 bonus PEX-Tokens.  Read more about Prime-Ex Perpetual in the white paper found at www.prime-ex.com. - www.facebook.com/PEXTokens - Twitter: @PEXTokens  Media Contact  Contact: Luis Cordero Email:   luis@prime-ex.com Location: Obarrio, Panama City, Panama, Sortis Business Tower  Prime-Ex Perpetual is the source of this content. Virtual currency is not legal tender, is not backed by any government. Accounts or value balances are not subject to consumer protections. This press release is for informational purposes only. The information does not constitute investment advice or an offer to invest.

Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Hi Apened,  We certainly know about Atlant and wish them success and all the best with their ICO.  Anyone that seeks to improve the real estate status quo is fine in our book.  We understand real estate.  We understand how a quality home starts with quality engineering, quality materials, and quality workmanship.  We understand chain of title.  We understand the value of comparable sales and quantifiable market data.  We understand the impact that document retention and complete, consistent loan files that are compliant with the company's underwriting guidelines have on the company's mortgage asset class.  We've worked in all phases of real estate as builders and bankers on two continents.    We understand the inefficiencies in the current system.  We understand how the market has shifted and how homebuilders, homeowners, and home lenders alike are at greater risk.  We believe we are uniquely qualified, given our experience, to help shape the future for the better.  You can read our whitepaper for all the details, but we've created a real estate ecosystem where everyone participating within our ecosystem wins.  Home builders win.  Home buyers win.  PEX-Token holders win.  We have created a fixed supply of tokens against an ever-increasing demand for tokens as principal payments are continually reinvested into the building of more and more houses.  The ecosystem wins.  Prime-Ex Perpetual wins.  The way that title is held is better because of the way that we use corporations.  The experience of the home buyer is better because of streamlined terms and the mitigation of their risk.  The experience of the home builder and home seller is better because they determine their own fate without the involvement of a third party controlling their future sales instead of themselves.  The quality of the collateral is better because experienced workers will be maintaining it month in and month out generating consistency across the collateral pool.    We've created an ecosystem that we believe is positioned to be first in our market.  Once the concept is proven the ecosystem will continue to expand both in terms of market cap and geographic reach.  We're not competing with other offerings.  We're getting up each morning, looking in the mirror, and figuring out how to end each day better than we started it.  I know I'm biased, but I like very much the road that we're on.  Thanks for asking!

Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Hi Retired,  Regarding thread support, we plan to have 22 separate threads regarding Prime-Ex Perpetual covering 22 languages.  It's impossible for my team to manage all of those especially if they prove to attract a decent amount of attention.  We planned for this possibility by creating a thread support bounty.  Users like you can earn free PEX-Tokens at the after-ICO disbursement of our tokens by simply supporting our project on this thread as well as the other threads in different languages.  So what is support?  If you see an advertisement out in the digital space somewhere about Prime-Ex, be sure to re-post it here.  Same goes for outside articles or other types of noteworthy things that you see out there about us.  If someone's having a hard time finding a document or signing up and we haven't addressed it yet, help them out. We'll get you some PEX.  Once the bounty program starts, the bounty page for the support thread will have a google docs form where you can post your user profile along with the URL for the bounty that you're claiming.  When you register to our website you will share with us your deposit key into a WAVES wallet that you set up.  Once you do that you'll receive PEX tokens at the end of the ICO.  It's as simple as that, and we much appreciate any support that anyone can help us with!

Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Thanks mickycob1!  We have put a whole lot of time and a whole lot of legal fees into putting this concept together in a way that is both beneficial to people and legally viable.  One or the other would not be a product I would endorse or promote, but fitting them together this way I like very much.  But maybe I'm biased   If you have any questions let me know, glad to help if I can.

Author: Prime-Ex Perpetual
Title: [ANN] Prime-Ex Perpetual - Bringing Real Estate Profits to YOU!
Body: Hi BTCBusinessConsult,  Thanks for checking us out!    Our concept is not renting, it's a legitimate sale but in a whole new way.  We build, sell, and finance our homes.  From the moment in which a lot is either developed or purchased by us, we put the lot inside of its own individual corporation, and we go ahead and affix the end user mortgage to the property.  When the property sells, the new buyers execute a promissory note that initiates payment terms toward the mortgage, and the shares of the corporation are transferred into the name of the buyer where the shares of the corporation are held in third-party escrow under an escrow agreement that the parties mutually agree to abide by.    Here's what's different about us:  Our buyers execute a maintenance agreement with us to where we cut the grass, maintain the landscaping, fix faucets, leaks, etc., in real-time as they occur.  That means service after the sale, and it means that we have eyes on our collateral on a monthly basis.  In essence, we're paid by our buyers to maintain our own collateral and that's a great thing, because we plan in advance for the possibility that we might be selling it again.  There's a built in minimum buyback clause that the buyers can execute that states we'll buy the house back at two-thirds what they paid for it.  That means that they can lock in their maximum risk exposure, and it means that we've placed ourselves on the same side of the table as our customer: what's good for them is good for us, and the customer has traded interest rate risk, or the risk of time, in favor of equity participation with us.  We all win!  There's of course more to it, but in essence that's the difference between a rental program and and ownership program.  Thanks again for checking us out, if you have any questions about the whitepaper please let me know!
